In todays specialized world, effective data-driven decision-making is essential for maintaining a competitive edge. Both governments and non-government organizations increasingly rely on research and analytics to inform sustainable development strategies, recognizing that research is a key driver in advancing knowledge and societal progress. Established in January 2015, the Bangladesh Research Institute for Development (BRID) was created to meet this need. As a multi-sectoral research firm, BRID employs advanced research techniques to offer clients meaningful insights and a broad spectrum of perspectives for informed decision-making. Apart from the core activities, BRID occationally co-ordinate and review reports, conduct event reports and other activities as per the requirement of the clients. Moreover, it is about to publish a series of talk named Thought of Human Development which contains valuable lecture of the development professionals regarding human development.
